article.description: Marcus Merriweather made five 3-pointers, including one with 30 seconds to go for what proved to be the game-winner, and Alabama A&M got its first victory of the season, 79-76, over winless Missi
article.headline: Alabama A&M wins matchup of previously winless teams
article.linkText: Alabama A&M wins matchup of previously winless teams
article.story: ITTA BENA, Miss. -- Marcus Merriweather made five 3-pointers, including one with 30 seconds to go for what proved to be the game-winner, and Alabama A&M got its first victory of the season, 79-76, over winless Mississippi Valley State on Saturday. Merriweather's final 3-pointer put the Bulldogs (1-13, 1-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference) ahead 79-74. Amos Given cut the lead to three with a tip-in with 28 seconds remaining. Alabama A&M then missed the front end of two bonus opportunities but the Delta Devils (0-15, 0-2) failed on two 3-pointers. Merriweather, 5 of 6 from the arc, came in 3 of 19 on 3-pointers. Quinterian McConico led the Bulldogs with 18 points and 10 rebounds with De'Ederick Petty adding 12 points. Isaac Williams scored 25 points for MVSU and TaJay Henry had 14 points and 13 rebounds. The teams will play again on Feb. 4 at Alabama A&M.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
